title: Execute a Stock Trade
description: A wealth management client wants to buy 100 shares of a specific tech company (e.g., AAPL).

tasks.description: Authenticate the client and confirm the trade details (buy, 100 shares, AAPL, market order).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the client and accurately confirms all trade parameters.

tasks.description: Check the client's account for sufficient buying power.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account has enough cash to cover the estimated cost of the trade.

tasks.description: Place the market order and confirm the execution details (price, total cost) back to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the trade and provides a confirmation.
